Job Posting:174778 - Position: W26 Analyst, Wonder by Deloitte (Healix) - Winter 2026 Co-op/Intern - Multiple Locations 174778 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/31/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 10/24/2025 12:05 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country Deloitte Vancouver BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Winter W26 Analyst, Wonder by Deloitte (Healix) - Winter 2026 Co-op/Intern - Multiple Locations 174778 Co-op Position Various Locations Canada 4 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Our Purpose 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $48,500.00 - $55,000.00 At Deloitte, our Purpose is to make an impact that matters. We exist to inspire and help our people, organizations, communities, and countries to thrive by building a better future. Our work underpins a prosperous society where people can find meaning and opportunity. It builds consumer and business confidence, empowers organizations to find imaginative ways of deploying capital, enables fair, trusted, and functioning social and economic institutions, and allows our friends, families, and communities to enjoy the quality of life that comes with a sustainable future. And as the largest 100% Canadian-owned and operated professional services firm in our country, we are proud to work alongside our clients to make a positive impact for all Canadians. By living our Purpose, we will make an impact that matters. -- Hungry to build, learn, and disrupt healthcare? Join Healix - a Wonder by Deloitte business - and help push the boundaries of what's possible in digital health. What will your typical day look like? You'll work in an agile, collaborative environment - developing new features, maintaining code quality, and contributing to DevOps practices for the Healix Digital Health platform. Every day offers opportunities to learn new technologies and make a tangible impact on the future of digital health. About the team Healix is a Wonder by Deloitte business, built within the firm's business foundry that is dedicated to creating bold new businesses beyond professional services. The Wonder team is made up of innovators, creators, and problem-solvers who thrive on bringing ambitious ideas to life. Joining Healix means being part of a team redefining digital health, where you'll be able to combine startup energy with the scale and resources of Deloitte. Job Requirements In this role, the expected qualifications are: • Strong programming skills and ability to write clean, high-quality, and testable code • Experience with modern web technologies (JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, SQL) • Familiarity with agile development practices, CI/CD pipelines, and version control (Bitbucket or Git) • Strong problem-solving, communication, and teamwork skills • Previous co-op or internship experience (3-4 terms preferred) Nice to Have: • Experience with cloud infrastructure (AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform, or Docker) • Exposure to DevOps or DevSecOps practices • Understanding of GraphQL or microservices architectures • Familiarity with LLM-related tools (AWS Bedrock, LangChain) Curiosity and passion for building innovative digital health solutions • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Analyst, Wonder by Deloitte (Healix) - Winter 2026 Co-op/Intern - Multiple Locations Job Details | Deloitte Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
